topic: Difficulties with the ECTS points and hardship application
question: I am having difficulty achieving the required ECTS points and am unsure how to proceed. Can I still submit a hardship application shortly before the start of the semester?"
answer: Please come to one of our office hours and bring your current TUMonline bank statement and your certificate of study progress. In a personal meeting, we can discuss the reasons for your difficulties and work out the best options for the future. Please find out about the requirements for a hardship application on our website beforehand.
